import React from 'react' import './bookings.css' import { Form,FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button } from 'reactstrap' const Bookings = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews}=tour const handleChange=e=>{} return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating===0?null:avgRating}({reviews?.length})
{/* bookingform */}
Information
{/* bookingform-end */}
) } export default Bookings
